name: gas-typescript-webpack
description: This is an example code for writing Google Apps Script in TypeScript and building with webpack
author: Naoki Sawada

scripts.watch: watch 'npm run build && npm run push && npm run deploy-test' src/
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && webpack --mode development --config ./webpack.config.js && npm run add-bundle-preamble && npm run copy-html
scripts.add-bundle-preamble: mv dist/bundle.js dist/bundle.original.js && cat src/bundlePreamble.js dist/bundle.original.js > dist/bundle.js && rm dist/bundle.original.js
